The International Contemporary Art Fair of returns from 20 to 23 October 2016 at the Grand Palais but also to the Petit Palais, Jardin des Tuileries or on the Banks of the Seine. In all, there are more than 187 galleries and nearly 3,000 artists will be highlighted on the occasion of the 43nd edition!
